As I suspected, the daemon is trying to kill the Bluetooth service and it is missing. This will need to be changed in a future version, and since I have to open a ticket with our devs for this, I will need to know your Distro, version and the EPP agent version you are using.
In the meantime, can you install a Bluetooth process or stack to stop the daemon's logs?
Please let me know the requested info so I can create the dev request.

Thank you,
